mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(PRICE, 'FM99,999') AS PRICE_COMMA, ALCOHOL, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM HANJU_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.FK_ID WHERE I.FILE_STATUS = 'T' AND (P.TYPE = 'T' OR P.TYPE = 'G')
